help_administration_management.lang_ham1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_administration_management.lang_ham4: Select the protocol for local access.
help_administration_management.lang_ham6: To allow wireless access to the Router's browser-based utility, keep the default, Enabled.
help_administration_management.lang_ham9: To manage the Router over the Internet, select Enabled.
help_administration_management.lang_ham11: Select the protocol for remote access.
help_administration_management.lang_ham13: To upgrade the Router's firmware over the Internet, select Enabled.
help_administration_management.lang_ham15: To allow access to the Router from any external IP address, select Any IP Address. To specify an external IP address or range of IP addresses, select and complete the IP address range fields.
help_administration_management.lang_ham17: Enter the port number that will be open to remote access.
help_administration_management.lang_ham18: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
